document_data.name: ''Wyrmtooth Dagger''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''wyrmtooth dagger''''' was a type of [[enchanted]] [[knife]] carved from a [[dragon]]'s tooth.
document_data.Powers: ''Wyrmtooth daggers'' were deadly weapons that could be enchanted to varying levels of power. Those struck with a solid blow found themselves stripped of any [[element]]al resistances. Additionally, [[sorcerer]]s could channel their [[magic]]s through a ''wyrmtooth dagger'' to bypass these same resistances.
document_data.Reputation: These daggers could be found from the [[Sword Coast]]{{Cite organized play/LFR/Lost in the Fog|25}} to [[Tymanther]].{{Cite organized play/LFR/Troubled Roads|17}} They were used by the [[frost giant]]s of [[Kultaakarr]]{{Cite organized play/LFR/Tyranny's Bitter Frost|10}} and by members of the [[Cult of the Dragon]].
document_data.Notable Owners: * [[Aldous Talbot]], a [[Waterdhavian]] merchant active in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
